title: I Need help badly
body:
Hi,

Recently i had thought on getting my friend a skin and dj sona for myself but as ive calculated it im going to be 30 rp short. And I was wondering if a riot employee is able to put 30 rp on my account. So that I can afford dj sona and my friends skins (Arcade Hecarim). Please get back to me as soon as someone can{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:120}}

replies.body: send a support ticket with an ms paint picture and they should give you the rp you need.

Im sorry but I dont really know how to do that so you might have to plan it out for me so i understand better. 

Sorry about that

You can add me on skype so its easier, my username is liop2309
you open ms paint. draw a %%%%ty painting of sona. you then save it. then you click the button in the top right hand corner that says support. you then follow the instructions and send it to riot.
